main event: A light ball of fire was observed entering the water near Ocean City, Maryland on July 27, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described by witnesses as a red ball or ball of red flame., Witnesses reported observing the object for approximately 15 minutes., It climbed vertically and disappeared from view., The sighting occurred during a period of extensive naval activity in the area., The investigation concluded that the object was possibly related to a smoke pot used during naval exercises.
